babel-plugin-syntax-class-properties

Allow parsing of class properties.

Installation

sh $ npm install babel-plugin-syntax-class-properties

Usage

Via .babelrc (Recommended)

.babelrc

json { "plugins": ["syntax-class-properties"] }

Via CLI

sh $ babel --plugins syntax-class-properties script.js

Via Node API

javascript require("babel-core").transform("code", { plugins: ["syntax-class-properties"] });
